messages.msg: Responsible to develop large scale government projects and multiple  outsourced projects using in PHP(CodeIgniter), and MySQL.
left Durbar in preparation of thesis and final semester at BRAC University.

Join OBHAI team as frontend developer.
Responsibilites include Frontend development in JAVA, new features  like digital payment, Firebase notifications etc. implementations and resolved bugs in google map.
left MGH to finish Masters in CBNU.
joined TeraArk as a Fullstack Developer
joined Teracomix team as tech lead.
